entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 08:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Fog dissipating. High 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
